scripts.clean:bundle: rimraf dist && rimraf dist-zip && turbo clean:bundle
scripts.clean:node_modules: turbo daemon stop && pnpx rimraf node_modules && pnpx turbo clean:node_modules
scripts.clean:turbo: turbo daemon stop && rimraf .turbo && turbo clean:turbo
scripts.clean: pnpm clean:bundle && pnpm clean:turbo && pnpm clean:node_modules
scripts.build: pnpm clean:bundle && turbo ready && turbo build
scripts.build:firefox: pnpm clean:bundle && turbo ready && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true turbo build
scripts.zip:firefox: pnpm build:firefox && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true pnpm -F zipper zip
scripts.dev: turbo ready && cross-env __DEV__=true turbo watch dev --concurrency 20
scripts.dev:firefox: turbo ready && cross-env __DEV__=true __FIREFOX__=true turbo watch dev --concurrency 20
scripts.e2e: pnpm build && pnpm zip && turbo e2e
scripts.e2e:firefox: pnpm build:firefox && pnpm zip:firefox && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true turbo e2e
